backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling application creation and retrieval with access control, storing applications in a Map and enforcing user/admin permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requests to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining a blue-themed OKLCH color system for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata and setting the document title to MD SUHEL - Certificate Services.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring layout and application routes with TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component showing MD SUHEL copyright and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with MD SUHEL branding, generated logo, navigation links, and Internet Identity auth controls.
frontend/src/components/RequireLoginNoti: Alert component prompting users to sign in with a quick login button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching the backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch a user's applications and a specific application by ID using an actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark blue-themed UI palettes.
Maps frontend form fields into the backend ApplicationForm format, including gender and nationality conversions.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Contains helpers to format timestamps into readable dates and to format application numbers with a prefix.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ApplicationDetailPage: Displays detailed information for a single application, including loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/MyApplicationsPage.ts: Shows a user's list of submitted applications with authentication, loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentialCertificat: Implements the residential certificate application form with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for container queries and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, branding requirements, features, and architectural notes for a formâ€‘based data collection website.
